product_name: Sugoi RS220 Bike Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sugoi RS220 Bike Jacket delivers powerful warmth and windproof protection with pro-level detailing and function. High-performance Firewall 220 fabric offers advanced thermal regulation, water resistance and breathability. 1-in. gripper elastic at hem keeps the jacket securely in place as you ride. The women's Sugoi RS220 Bike Jacket has 2 rear zippered pockets. Reflective accents enhance visibility. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sugoi RS220 Bike Jacket delivers powerful warmth and windproof protection with pro-level detailing and function.
